articles.author: Jeanne Sahadi
articles.title: What's in the House tax bill for people
articles.description: The House Republican tax bill gives a detailed look at how House Republicans want to reshape the tax code.

articles.title: President Trump today: Live updates
articles.description: President Trump will announce his pick for the next chairman of the Federal Reserve while two of his former campaign officials make a court appearance. Follow here for live updates.

articles.title: GOP unveils key details in new tax plan
articles.description: House Republicans unveiled key details and the text behind their tax legislation Thursday, with House Speaker Paul Ryan pitching the plan as much-needed economic aid for the middle class.

articles.title: Sanders explains tax plan with beer anecdote  - CNN Video
articles.description: White House press secretary Sarah Sanders opened the White House press briefing with a beer drinking anecdote to explain President Trump's tax plan.

articles.author: Jeffrey Sachs
articles.title: The ominous absurdity of Trump's tax cuts
articles.description: The Republicans' proposed corporate tax cuts pose an ominous threat to the common good, says Jeffrey Sachs. The GOP needs to get out from under the thumb of plutocrats.

articles.title: Fact check: Trump's dubious $4,000 claim - CNN Video
articles.description: Jake Tapper, in partnership with FactCheck.org, looks at a claim that President Trump is making about his corporate tax plan. Read more at FactCheck.org

articles.author: Manu Raju, Evan Perez and Marshall Cohen, CNN
articles.title: Sessions under renewed scrutiny on Capitol Hill
articles.description: Attorney General Jeff Sessions is once again under scrutiny on Capitol Hill regarding his candor about Russia and the Trump campaign amid revelations that he rejected a suggestion to convene a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Donald Trump last year.

articles.author: Evan Perez, Jeff Zeleny, Manu Raju and Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Trump nominee for top Agriculture post withdraws amid Russia probe
articles.description: Sam Clovis, President Donald Trump's nominee to be the Department of Agriculture's chief scientist, withdrew himself from consideration Thursday, the White House announced.

articles.author: Andrew Kaczynski, CNN
articles.title: Trump pick Sam Clovis blasted schools for 'indoctrinating' students with ideas like 'environmentalism' and 'racism'
articles.description: Donald Trump's nominee to be the chief scientist for the Department of Agriculture, Sam Clovis, wrote in a 2011 newsletter that progressives, through the public school system, have been "indoctrinating children" with concepts he said are contrary to America's founding, including environmentalism and racism.
